below is my batch command.

@echo off
java loader

[/quote]

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" loader

Try this.[/quote]
oops i ment my code is @echo off title your client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
wrong rsps lol
